name: ZXZXZ
description:
A very much unfinished Apple ][ styled RPG engine prototype slapped together in about 5 days for a gamejam. There's only the tiny world map, the town never got implemented so you can't enter. Not much to see here!!

Built on libGDX + artemis-odb.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

arrows: move

S: status screen

I: inventory

A: attack

ESC: exit

SPACE: return from status/inventory screen
